= Using Ground Control Station =

Make sure that you installed and configured hardware per [http://code.google.com/p/ardupilot/wiki/IntroductionPage ArduPilot Instructions]. 
Don't power-up ArduPilot yet. 

Start GCS by clicking on the application.
